text: Officially Reopened for Business Oceanside restaurant 221 N Cleveland St Oceanside, CA 92054 (760) 755-7040 Experience Authentic Italian Dining at OCEANSIDE Indulge in the authentic flavors of Italy at our restaurant, where our world-renowned chefs and seasoned restaurant managers bring over 30 years of international fine dining expertise to every dish. Savor our meticulously crafted pizzas, pastas, and seafood, each prepared with the utmost care and tradition. Enhance your dining experience with our weekly specials, inspired by the culinary genius of Chef Marcello, and discover a new layer of delight with every visit. Oceanside events Keep up with all our events at our Oceanside location with Live Music, Happy Hour and Lunch hours.
